messages.title: Straight talking. Vote UKIP
messages.content:
Say NO to mass immigration
Say YES to referendums on all major issues
Say NO to wasting £45 million a day in Brussels
SEND THE POLITICIANS A MESSAGE...

messages.title: My local issues are
messages.content:
Restore honesty and integrity to politics and public life.
Cut the enormous waste in public spending, both locally and nationally.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Say YES to referendums on all major issues
Say NO to wasting £45 million a day in Brussels
Restore honesty and integrity to politics and public life.
Cut the enormous waste in public spending, both locally and nationally.

mentions.candidate: John Pitts supports local opposition to over-development of housing in Colchester, and the need to tackle congestion in the Town.

issues.brexitEurope: Say NO to wasting £45 million a day in Brussels
issues.economy: Cut the enormous waste in public spending, both locally and nationally.
issues.governance: Restore honesty and integrity to politics and public life.

housing.content: John Pitts supports local opposition to over-development of housing in Colchester, and the need to tackle congestion in the Town.

leaflet.personalStatement: John was born and raised in Colchester, and is a family man with five children and two grandchildren. John was a parish councillor and a school governor, he is also an active member of his local church. He is a local businessman, principally in transport and property. He is concerned about EU over-regulation that is stifling business.

contactInformation.address: UKIP Freepost RSTU-ZJGB-UGGL, UK Independence Party, PO Box 408, Newton Abbot TQ12 9BG

leaflet.additionalNotes: Please detach this coupon and endorse John Pitts by which you can write the Freepost address – no stamp required.
